content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">   <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/u-s-climate-reference-network-uscrn-daily-products">     <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="urn:uuid:96c2be2d-0dea-491f-a792-d1eabf960a58"></owl:sameAs>     <dct:description>USCRN Daily Products are available on public FTP and derived from the USCRN processed data. Daily products include averages and calculated values for precipitation, air temperature, solar radiation, surface temperature, relative humidity, soil moisture, and soil temperature on a daily time scale. Other products are available from USCRN, including sub-hourly, hourly, and monthly products. It is the general practice of USCRN to not calculate derived variables if the input data to these calculations are flagged. These data records are versioned based on the processing methods and algorithms used for the derivations, and data are updated when the higher quality raw data become available from stations' datalogger storage (Datalogger Files).</dct:description>         <dcat:keyword>soil moisture probe</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>atmosphere</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>united states of
